# MainPanl

# Empty Panel
```{python}
from jscaffold.panel.mainpanel import MainPanel
main_panel = MainPanel()
main_panel.widget
```

- It will show an empty panel

# Append Form

```{python}
from jscaffold.panel.mainpanel import MainPanel
from jscaffold import form
main_panel = MainPanel()
main_panel.form("var1")
main_panel.widget
```

# Nested Form

```{python}
from jscaffold.panel.mainpanel import MainPanel
from jscaffold import form
main_panel = MainPanel()
main_panel.form("var1").form("var2")
main_panel.widget
```
